name: MakeRocket Block Hexa Puzzle
description:
MakeRocket is a block puzzle game that anyone can enjoy!

The rules are simple:
Just fit the blocks displayed at the bottom into the open spaces.

Although the controlling is easy, this game will make you use your brain!
It's great for training your mind and preventing dementia!

Why not try aiming for a high score or competing with your friends?
